comment: Folks. You've improved the speed of loading thank god. Can you now stop favourites shifting order based on what was accessed last please? No Point in being able to set the order only to have it immediately change. Have ended up looking for wrong buses before now and arrived late. Annoying!

author: Bes Mir
comment: Just updated and on some points it just crashed. On the option/more bang crash

author: Ania Kapadia
comment: Really user friendly. Best bus app!

author: Tristram Bovell
comment: In principle, I like this app. However some improvements are needed! (#1) - All bus timetables are not available. This is hit and miss, depending on the route e.g. H25 bus timetable, not available! (#2) - Adding a bus to the widget needs to be clearer! Every time I have a need to add a new bus, I have to search the entire app to work out how to do it again. Please use a '+' symbol instead of the 3 dot crumbs icon, it would be clearer. Also, perhaps add something to the tab where my routes are stored to make it easier to add from that tab. (#3) - I have and use 3 phones. I'd like for my experience of the app to be account based, so that logging in, pulls down my settings and stored buses from the cloud. Save me having to make changes on each phone. My updates should sync across all devices seamlessly. (#4) - The app sometimes crashes when searching for a bus or road name that is valid. Please fix this. Thanks for these long overdue updates. 5 starts coming when updated 👍 apart from these fixes, great app!!!

author: Kirsty O'Neill
comment: I had this app on my old phone and loved it. Since I installed on my new device it prompts me CONSTANTLY to let it access my location. There's no "stop asking" option so I'm having to uninstall it.

author: Gerard Krupa
comment: Works pretty well except that the Android Wear support advertised seems to be nonexistent and why the hell does it need permission to make phone calls in order to remove ads?

author: Khadijah Abdullah
comment: London live bus countdown is a very helpful app. It helps you know when your bus will leave and when you have to leave.

author: Hamzah Zaahir
comment: It doesn't show the application on my android wear device 😥

author: Michael Eze
comment: I think it's intresting
It's good
It tells me what buses are due all around me

I have been using this app for 3 weeks now and i do really enjoy/ love using the app. So far it has been very accurate in bus timings and works fast too. The only thing i wish is that it would give you the actual time that the busses are supposed to arrive as well as the countdown. Still i give this app two thumbs up and 5 stars.

author: Harvey Keane
comment: This app is the most unreliable app I have ever used! One day the times will be ruftly accurate, and another day it will not tell you anything on times and will constantly say " no Bus within 30 minutes (the maximum time they can predict). I rely on this app on a daily basis and so this is a big problem for me which needs immediate fixing!
It tells me when various buses are due at my stop. Would like timetable for 261 though

author: Grant West
comment: Used this app for a couple of years, but just over the last week it's started showing only every second bus from my home bus stop. Downloaded another app which shows them all, so definitely a problem with this app.

reply.author: Mobicia
reply.content: Thank you for taking the time to review our app. Are you able to email support@londonbusapp.com with the name of the bus stop so we can investigate and resolve the issue? Many thanks

author: Kiinga Kovacs
comment: I loved this app to start with, but I haven't been able to use it for the past 2 days, it simply won't load bus times. It keeps telling me that there are no buses to your stop in the next 30 mins which contradicts the online timetables. Please fix it, I need this app!!

author: Janetmaria Burke
comment: I have had nothing but problems all wk end. Not working. Not giving me any bus times apart from a 493 bus. I walk then all the buses drove past me. So there were buses but this thing is not recording them. Unreliable.

author: Rebecca Wise
comment: I travel a lot by bus to go to college . This app help me work out what time the buses are coming and I can plan my journey now and this is simple but I love it and I told my friends about this app they love it to now I would recommend this to anyone that take buses to places

author: Darren Gomes
comment: Used Pro Bus before, but that didn't always work, usually when you needed it.  This one is a lot more reliable, though the layout is a bit on the cluttered side.

author: Safi Salik
comment: Lies, for the past few months the app has been great! Recently 90% of whats mentioned is Lies, the data is not accurate.

I find it amazing just as efficient as the UBER APP, very accurate, useful and believe it or not a bit of fun when for a second or two it finds you and gives so many choices of bus times and directions

author: Tim H
comment: Dpwngrade from 2 to 1 star as data is junk. Just chose to walk rather than wait 15 minutes then bus not on app drives past #fuckingjoke. Installsupports android wear. However much slower to find your location than other similar apps and no way to filter specific routes are bus stop which is a essential basic option in London where you are unlikely to be interested in all routes as they head it various directions!!!

author: Lina Christopoulou
comment: Totally changed the way I use public transport. Now can't live without it.

author: Omid Aminnia
comment: Great app but the widget doesn't work properly. The refresh button is broken

author: Simon Lukes
comment: Well designed app. Takes a small amount of getting used to die to the large amount of information displayed. now it's indispensable.

author: Ian Wyght
comment: Good so far. Does this app support Android Wear 1.5. Can't see the app on my watch?

author: scott grimley
comment: Very handy app to have have had the odd bit of awkwardness with it thats the only reason its not 5 stars

author: Peter Alekkou
comment: Widget is unresponsive and only works when app is open and running in the background.

author: Josh Gedalovitch
comment: Dank for checking bus times. Works well, accurate. Provides tfl updates too. Just good

author: Eva Fontaine
comment: User friendly. Quick and easy to find the bus route you need. Updates so that you don't have to manually refresh like some others. Highly recommend.

author: Fehmee John
comment: This app hasnt failed me yet, always keeps me up to date, and the bus always arrived within the time that has been stated! Ace app!

author: Morgan Vine
comment: The Bus Times app makes it really easy to know when buses are coming. It's simple to use and makes travelling around London much simpler.
This is a great app and the updates have really improved the stability and usability. It makes planning my journeys so much easier

author: J Argent
comment: 99% of the time it is accurate. Can plan a journey nicley. Would be nice if the app could tell you if a bus stop is closed when you open the bus stop.
I'm not very good at this tech stuff but this app is easy to use and does everything I need.

author: Andy Grove
comment: Watch app doesn't install. Doesn't even show in the list of apps for the watch

author: Dagafode Bolo
comment: It's alright but a little unreliable.

author: Philomena Brown
comment: Love the app but ads are a little annoying.
I like the app but sometimes it don't tell me when the next bus is coming and it will say the bus won't come in 30 minutes
It seems good but was using 1% battery and I do not know how to put it to sleep as I do not often use it.
